item.title: Technology ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
item.description: I am really enthusiastic about Technology. I love to code, experiment with linux, troubleshoot problems, etc. I even have a home server you can read about here.

item.title: Cooking & Baking ğŸ³
item.description: I love to bake and cook, and i’ve made many dishes like Tteokbokki, Macarons, Lasagna, Cakes, Muffins, Malai Tikka, Pizza, Pasta, Breads, etc.

item.title: Pet Owner ğŸ¶
item.description: I have a little doge named Keona, who’s the best thing in my life. She’s a Lhasa apso, 3 years old, and loves to lick my face.

item.title: Gaming ğŸ®
item.description:
I play many games like Minecraft, Valorant, Forza Horizon 4, Stardew Valley.

item.title: 3D-Printing ğŸ–¨ï¸
item.description: I have an Creality Ender 3 3D-Printer and use it with Octoprint, Cura, and model using AutoDesk Fusion 360.

item.title: Home Server ğŸ–¥ï¸
item.description: I’m running a proxmox home server with services like Jellyfin, Pi-Hole, QBittorrent, HomeAssistant, and more. I also use it to expirement with linux and self host many other services.

item.title: Crocheting ğŸŒ€
item.description: I started crocheting 2 years ago in 2022 and since then have crocheted many bags, pouches, caps, etc
